name: PAINBOY - Playable Teaser
description:
Set in the 80s in the imaginary city of Palms Ville in California, and born as a graphic novel of five volumes 7 years ago, after had being a Doom II mod, Painboy is a hand-drawn arena FPS with Metroidvania elements where the story is told with strange storytelling. 

Unfortunately, it is my most ambitious project, so it's not Painboy. 
This is just a playable teaser made for the "Two Minutes horror game Jam".

Language available:
-Italian
-English

[CONTROLS]
________

WASD - Move
Left Mouse Button - Interact
Left Click while Right Mouse Button is pressed- Shoot with the gun
Escape - Close the game
________

That's it.
Curious to read your comments! =:)
